questions.question:
Find the mean temperature from a cubical furnace kept on a concrete floor. If the outside temperature of the furnace is 80oC and surrounding air is at 20oC. The sides of the furnace are 1m. At mean temperature, take the following properties.
ρ = 1.0193
K = 0.0283w/m-k
CP = 1005 J/Kg-k
Pr = 0.698
μ = 19.6*10-6 Ns/m
ν = 17.95*10-6 m2/s
$$ T_m = \frac{T_s + T_f}{2} $$

Find the rate of heat loss from a cubical furnace kept on a concrete floor. If the outside temperature of the furnace is 80oC and surrounding air is at 20oC. The sides of the furnace are 1m. At mean temperature, take the following properties.
ρ = 1.0193
K = 0.0283w/m-k
CP = 1005 J/Kg-k
Pr = 0.698
μ = 19.6*10-6 Ns/m
ν = 17.95*10-6 m2/s
Q = QT + QS
